title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Help Martin Madrazo Execute Daily Bounties
content:
Martin Madrazo heard about you going into business with Maude and Jenette — and he wants in on the action.

You will receive a different target every day by text from Martin. Find the targets on the Map, take them out, and be rewarded generously — especially if you use his weapon of choice.

Buy a Bail Office and wait for Martin’s text to unlock Daily Madrazo Bounties.
